alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 26 at 2:52PM MST until December 27 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph causing considerable blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Eastern Sawatch Mountains Above 11000 Feet. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on icy and snow packed roads. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
